name: ROACORE
description: ROACORE is a Web3 ecosystem that transforms everyday behavior—walking, cultural experiences, and digital engagement—into data-driven value. Through DOGDOG, MODA Gallery, and ROA STORE, user activity is analyzed by AI and returned as personalized rewards, consumable utility, and ecosystem participation benefits. By linking real-world actions with on-chain assets, ROACORE creates a seamless cycle of engagement and value, enabling a new model of “Real Utility, Real Life.”
